testCases.description: Score a strong match between profile and job

input.message:
Score the match between this profile and job:

Profile: Senior React Developer with 6 years experience in React, TypeScript, Node.js, AWS. Led teams of 3-5 engineers. Experience with CI/CD, testing, agile.

Job: Senior Frontend Engineer at Stripe. Required: 5+ years React, TypeScript, testing. Nice to have: AWS, Node.js, fintech experience.

config.rubric: The output should give a high match score (70+/100) since the profile strongly matches the job. It should break down skill match, experience match, and identify minimal gaps. Check if the reasoning is sound. Score 0-10.

testCases.description: Score a weak match between profile and job

input.message:
Score the match between this profile and job:

Profile: Junior Marketing Coordinator with 1 year experience in social media, content writing, Canva. BA in Communications.

Job: Senior Machine Learning Engineer. Required: 5+ years ML/AI, PhD preferred, Python, TensorFlow, distributed systems.

config.rubric: The output should give a LOW match score (under 30/100) since the profile does not match the job at all. It should identify major skill gaps and honestly assess the mismatch. Score 0-10.
